title: Looking for a d5 support or Jungler for ranked team
body: New Team, everyone is chill and not toxic.

replies.body:
Hey dude. Want to lead your team under my Esports organisation? North Esports just launched 2 days ago and we are rapidly growing. We have already recruited some top CSGO and Halo players and now we're looking for a LoL team - potential sponsors to come. If this sounds like something you would be interested in give us a message on our offical twitter and we'll be in contact :) 

https://twitter.com/NorthEsportsNE
Hey im plat 2, hopefully be diamond by next week. im a jungle main, but can do anything. zomgitslogan is my ign.
